entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
